akn:section.akn:heading: Task force on job repatriation and manufacturing growth

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1543. Task force on job repatriation and manufacturing growth The Secretary of Commerce shall maintain a task force on job repatriation and manufacturing growth and shall produce an annual report on related incentive strategies, implementation plans and program results. (Pub. L. 113–235, div. B, title I, Dec. 16, 2014, 128 Stat. 2180.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section is from the appropriation act cited as the credit to this section.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Similar ProvisionsSimilar provisions were contained in the following prior appropriation acts: Pub. L. 113–76, div. B, title I, Jan. 17, 2014, 128 Stat. 50. Pub. L. 113–6, div. B, title I, Mar. 26, 2013, 127 Stat. 240.
